definition: variant of 推諉|推诿[tui1 wei3]
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
surname Wei
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: However, buck-passing would be an equally likely outcome.
sentences.chinese: 然而，推委責任就很有可能是“接管”這樣一種結局。

sentences.english: Winners do not play helpless, or do they play the blaming game.
sentences.chinese: 成功者不依賴別人，也不推委責任。

sentences.english: He easily has the tendency Selection Committee, a lazy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 他容易有推委的傾向，也比較懶惰和貪玩。

definition: to decline/to avoid/shirking responsibilities/to blame others/to pass the buck/to unload one's responsibilities/to try to get out of a task
to offer excuses (colloquial)/to stall
to make excuses/to give an excuse (for not doing something)
mutually shirking responsibilities (idiom); each blaming the other/passing the buck to and fro/each trying to unload responsibilities onto the other
to evade/to shirk
to carry out one's duties perfunctorily/to fulfill one's responsibility
to put the blame on sb else
to use all sorts of excuses
to skimp on the job/to work half-heartedly/not to take the job seriously
to play deaf-mute
to muddle through/to fob sb off/to beat around the bush/to dodge
to cover up one's faults (idiom)/to whitewash
to criticize
to fool/to hoodwink/to dupe
to deceive one's superiors and bully one's subordinates (idiom)
grievance/hatred
